summary: These custom (new models) sword, dagger, bow and shield are designed as a matching appearance set. The shield is emblazoned with a dragon symbol and the sword and dagger are engraved with the same symbol and the word \"Dovahkiin\"
descriptionHtml:
These custom (new models*) sword, dagger, bow and shield are designed as a matching appearance set. The shield is emblazoned with a dragon symbol and the sword and dagger are engraved with the same symbol and the word \"Dovahkiin\".

* Bow is modified Nightingale, arrow quiver is modified Dwarven. Other models are new.

[u]Operation[/u]:

The following non-enchanted items will automatically be added to your inventory at game start-up: (Enchanted versions must be Forged)

1 Sword
1 Dagger
1 Bow
150 Arrows
1 Light Shield
1 Heavy Shield
2 Recipies (listing special items required for forging enchanted versions)

[u]Items included[/u]:

- Sword (standard and enchanted) *
- Dagger (standard and enchanted) *
- Bow (standard and enchanted) *
- Arrow
- Shield (standard and enchanted) in both Light and Heavy versions **
- Recipies listing special items for Forging the enchanted items.

[u]Enchantment Notes[/u]: 

* Sword, dagger and bow can be Forged with \"Dragonslayer\" enchantment
** Shields can be Forged with \"Spellbreaker\" enchantment

Dragonslayer weapons do 20 points extra damage to Dragons, 10 points shock damage to others and fills a soul gem if target dies within 20 seconds.

Spellbreaker shields create a ward that protects against spells for up to 50 points and when hit, absorbs up to 20 points magicka and stamina.

[u]Tempering[/u] (improving) requirements:

No special Perks are needed

[u]Forging[/u] (Smithing Perks required):

- Sword (Elven)
- Dagger (Elven)
- Light Shield (Elven)
- Heavy Shield (Orcish)
- Arrows (no Perk required)

[u]Change Log[/u]:

Version 1.1 May 09, 2012 PST)

- Fixed Sword could not be improved (Tempered) at Smithing stations

Version 1.0 May 08, 2012 PST)

- Initial version
author: Phoenixn aka Observe
